# Helm of Telepathy
## Overview
**Aura** faint divination and enchantment; **CL** 5th

**Slot** head

**Price** 27,000 gp

**Weight** 3 lbs.

**Description**

This pale metal or ivory helm covers much of the head when worn. The wearer can use *[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|detect thoughts]]* at will. Furthermore, he can send a telepathic message to anyone whose surface thoughts he is reading (allowing two-way communication). Once per day, the wearer of the helm can implant a *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]* (as the spell, Will DC 14 negates) along with his telepathic message.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|detect thoughts]], [[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*

**Cost** 13,500 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 518
